GSP33yamss_pu:385: pratīter eva sat kiṃ na bādhān nāsat kuto jagat ? /
GSP33yamss_pu:388: mithyā vā paramārtho vā nādyaḥ kalpo 'yam añjasā // YSsi_184 //
GSP33yamss_pu:391: sarvāṇy eva pramāṇāni svaṃ svam arthaṃ yathoditam /
GSP33yamss_pu:392: asato 'rthāntarebhyaś ca vyavacchindanti bhānti naḥ // YSsi_183 //
GSP33yamss_pu:393: tathā hīha ghaṭo 'stīti yeyaṃ dhīr upajāyate /
GSP33yamss_pu:394: sā tadā tasya nābhāvaṃ paṭatvaṃ vānumanyate // YSsi_187 //
GSP33yamss_pu:395: nanv astīti yad uktaṃ kiṃ tanmātraṃ ghaṭa ity api /
GSP33yamss_pu:397: arthāntaratve siddhaṃ tat sadasadbhyāṃ vilakṣaṇam // YSsi_188 //
GSP33yamss_pu:398: yady evam asti brahmeti brahmaupaniṣadaṃ matam /
GSP33yamss_pu:403: yad yathā kiñcid ucyeta tatsarvasya tathā bhavet // YSsi_191 //
GSP33yamss_pu:407: svaiḥ svair vyavasthitai rūpaiḥ padārthānāṃ tu yā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yamss_pu:408: sā sattā na svatantrānyā tatrādvaitakathā katham // YSsi_193 //
GSP33yamss_pu:410: na vedyaṃ vittidharmaḥ syād iti yatprāgudīritam // YSsi_194 //
GSP33yamss_pu:411: tenāpi sādhitaṃ kiñcit saṃvido 'sti na vā tvayā /
GSP33yamss_pu:412: asti cet pakṣapātaḥ syān na cet te viphalaḥ śramaḥ // YSsi_195 //
GSP33yamss_pu:416: na ced asti sasāmānyaṃ sarvaṃ saṃvedanāspadam // YSsi_197 //
GSP33yamss_pu:418: yad etad aparādhīna- svaprakāśaṃ tad eva hi /
GSP33yamss_pu:420: yasminn abhāsamāne 'pi yo nāmārtho na bhāsate /
GSP33yamss_pu:421: nāsāv arthāntaras tasmān mithyendur iva candrataḥ // YSsi_199 //
GSP33yamss_pu:423: iti saṃvidvivartatvaṃ prapañcaḥ sphuṭam añcati // YSsi_200 //
GSP33yamss_pu:426: tathā hīdam ahaṃ vedmīty anyonyānātmanā sphuṭam /
GSP33yamss_pu:427: trayaṃ sākṣāc cakāstīti sarveṣām atmasākṣikam // YSsi_202 //
GSP33yamss_pu:429: na hi vahner anuṣṇatvaṃ dravyatvād anumīyate // YSsi_203 //
GSP33yamss_pu:430: kiñ ca hetur viruddho 'yaṃ sahabhāvo dvayor yataḥ /
GSP33yamss_pu:431: tavāpi na hi saṃvitiḥ svātmanā saha bhāsate // YSsi_204 //
GSP33yamss_pu:433: svāpādau bhāsate, naivam arthaḥ saṃvedanāt pṛthak /
GSP33yamss_pu:434: tena saṃvedanaṃ satyaṃ aṃvedyo 'rthas tv asann iti // YSsi_205 //
GSP33yamss_pu:437: yasmād ṛte yad ābhāti bhāti (ta)smād ṛte 'pi tat /
GSP33yamss_pu:438: ghaṭād ṛte 'pi nirbhātaḥ paṭād iva ghaṭaḥ svayam // YSsi_207 //
